meanings.definition: The act of riding a unicycle.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching unicycling performances at the circus.
meanings.sent3: The clown surprised everyone by unicycling backwards.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like unicycling on a tightrope, always teetering on the edge.
meanings.sent5: The image of unicycling through a field of sunflowers stayed with her for years.

meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding a unicycle.
meanings.sent1: Competing in unicycling events is challenging.
meanings.sent2: Unicycling is a fun and unique way to stay active.
meanings.sent3: The unicycling competition had everyone cheering loudly.
meanings.sent4: In the world of extreme sports, unicycling stands out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: The joy of unicycling brought a smile to his face every time he rode.

meanings.sent1: She learned how to unicycle in just a few days.
meanings.sent2: Unicycling through the park is a great way to enjoy the outdoors.
meanings.sent3: He unicycled to work to avoid traffic jams.
meanings.sent4: Unicycling into the sunset, he felt a sense of freedom.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as they tried to unicycle for the first time.
